translation.en: [Jake] My generation, we were born into war.
A gateway to another dimension at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean.
translation.es: Un portal a otra dimensión en el fondo del Océano Pacífico.

translation.en: They were sent by an alien race on the other side, the Precursors.
translation.es: Los envió una raza extraterrestre del otro lado, los precursores.

translation.en: So big, they needed two pilots to run 'em.
translation.es: Tan grandes que necesitaban dos pilotos.
Mi padre fue uno de ellos.

translation.en: He sacrificed himself to help save the world.
translation.es: Se sacrificó para ayudar a salvar al mundo.

translation.en: It's been 10 years since we won the war
translation.es: Hace diez años ganamos la guerra
La mayoría del mundo se recuperó. AUGE EN CONSTRUCCIÓN IMPULSA LA ECONOMÍA GLOBAL

translation.en: But a few coastal cities never did.
And the world is still picking up the pieces.
translation.es: El mundo sigue pagando los platos rotos.

translation.en: But some of us live better in a broken world.
translation.es: Pero algunos vivimos mejor en un mundo roto.

translation.en: And squatting in half a mansion
translation.es: Y es mejor vivir sin pagar en media mansión

translation.en: is better than paying for some crappy apartment.
translation.es: que pagar por un cuchitril. CUCHITRIL APARTAMENTOS

translation.en: Now, in the relief zones, you have to get creative.
translation.es: En las zonas afectadas, hay que ser creativo.

translation.en: You have to hustle, or somebody else might eat your breakfast.
translation.es: Tienes que moverte o te quitan el desayuno.

translation.en: You know, out here, we place a different value on things.
translation.es: Aquí las cosas tienen un valor distinto.

translation.en: The Pan Pacific Defense Corps usually looks the other way
translation.es: El Cuerpo de Defensa del Pacífico se hace el tonto

translation.en: as long as you don't go poking around where you don't belong.
translation.es: mientras no te metas en donde no debes.

translation.en: Say, like a decommissioned Jaeger scrapyard.
translation.es: Como un depósito de jaegers desmantelados. DEPÓSITO DE JAEGERS DESMANTELADOS
Los grandes riesgos pagan en grande.

translation.en: And nothing pays more than stolen Jaeger tech.
translation.es: Y la tecnología de jaegers robada paga muy bien.

translation.en: Plenty of nutcases out here trying to slap together their own Jaegers.
translation.es: Hay montones de locos tratando de armar sus jaegers.

translation.en: But they need the parts to do it.
So if you can steal what no one else can steal,
translation.es: Si puedes robar lo que nadie más puede...

translation.en: you can live like a king.
[Sonny] Are you sure it's in here?
[Jake] Power cores are stripped before they get decommissioned.
translation.es: Siempre les quitan los núcleos de energía.

translation.en: But sometimes they miss the tertiary plasma capacitors.
translation.es: Pero a veces dejan los condensadores de plasma.

translation.en: And that's a big score. This one's still holding a charge.
translation.es: Y esos valen mucho. Este aún tiene carga.

translation.en: Let's just calm down. Let's not get excited.
I'm just playing the odds here.
You cheated Barada in Juarez, skipped out on Chau in Hong Kong.
translation.es: Estafaste a Barada en Juárez, huiste de Chau en Hong Kong.
- Fue un malentendido. - Y me robaste a mí

translation.en: And stole from me in my own backyard.
translation.es: - Fue un malentendido. - Y me robaste a mí en mi territorio.

translation.en: Now I'm stealing for you. Circle of life.
translation.es: Ahora robo por encargo tuyo. El círculo de la vida.

translation.en: Hey, man, uh, just a little situation.
it's supposed to be right there,
but you know what, let me just figure this out.
Somebody please kill this guy for me.
You, wait, wait! Someone else is in here.
[man] Hey, boss, he went over here! [Sonny] Go, go, go, go!
[man] I see him. I see him.
[Sonny in muffled voice] Jake, you son of a...
[Jake] Hey! Get back here with that!
-How old are you? -Old enough to kick your ass.
Let's take a second. Back up.
I think I can sell your little toy for a whole lot of money.
translation.es: Creo que puedo vender tu juguete por mucho dinero.

translation.en: Scrapper's not a toy, and she's not for sale.
translation.es: Scrapper no es un juguete y no la vendo.

translation.en: The man holding the pipe says she is. So listen up...
translation.es: El hombre con el tubo dice que sí. Escucha...

translation.en: [Amara] Come on, come on, come on!
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hey! Get out.
What are you doing? No, no, no.
The other cradle. A Jaeger needs two pilots.
Scrapper is small enough to run on a single neural lobe.
translation.es: Scrapper funciona con un solo lóbulo.

translation.en: All right, then you get out, and you let me pilot.
-Told you she's not a toy. -You're gonna get us killed.
translation.es: - Te dije, no es un juguete. - Nos vas a matar.

translation.en: -I can get us out of here. -I just got us out.
translation.es: - Yo puedo sacarnos. - Yo ya nos saqué.

translation.en: this is the Pan Pacific Defense Corps.
translation.es: habla el Cuerpo de Defensa del Pacífico.

translation.en: Power down and exit your Conn-Pod.
translation.es: Apáguenlo y salgan de la cabina.

translation.en: No, no, no. Don't, don't, don't. Don't give up.
You give up way too easy.
You're in violation of Code 10 Section 14.

translation.es: Operación de un jaeger no registrado.
Les gané a los pilotos de November Ajax.

translation.en: Okay. What do you got? And I'm not getting out.
translation.es: Bueno. ¿Qué se te ocurre? Y no me voy a salir.

translation.en: One of those ion cells redundant?
-But we need them. -Get up to Ajax's head.
translation.es: - Son necesarias. - Ve a la cabeza.

translation.en: [electronic voice] Low power warning. Twelve percent.
I told you we needed that!
How long before Ajax can reboot his systems?
Look what you did to my Jaeger, you jerk!
translation.es: ¡Mira lo que le hiciste a mi jaeger, idiota!

translation.en: Oh, like this is my fault?
-Yes. My command center. -Wait. Sorry, I didn't hear that.
translation.es: - Mi centro de mando. - No oí.

translation.en: And you had no place to come in and try to tell me what to do.
translation.es: Y no tenías por qué venir a decirme qué hacer.

translation.en: I go wherever I want. It's a different world.
translation.es: Yo voy a donde yo quiera. El mundo es distinto.

translation.en: 'Cause it really worked out well, right? Look where we're at.
Your top lip and your bottom lip, they need to meet and become friends.
translation.es: Tus dos labios necesitan hacerse amigos.

translation.en: They need to close up, all right? Shut up.
What happened to the shutting up?
You said you wasn't gonna sell it, so what the hell was you gonna do?
translation.es: Si no lo ibas a vender, ¿qué pensabas hacer?

translation.en: I built her because one day, they're gonna come back.
translation.es: Lo hice porque un día, van a volver.

translation.en: And when they do, I'm not gonna be stuck
waiting for someone else to come save my ass.
translation.es: esperando a que alguien me salve.

translation.en: Look, it's just a stretch of bad luck. I'll figure it out.
translation.es: He tenido mala suerte. Lo resolveré.

translation.en: Father used to say we make our own luck.
translation.es: Padre decía que cada uno crea su suerte.

translation.en: Yeah, well, Dad said a lot of things.
You were arrested in a rogue Jaeger.
Hold on a second. That wasn't my Jaeger. There's this little kid.
translation.es: Un segundo. No era mío. Hay una niña.
- Es así de alta... - Tienes antecedentes.

translation.en: That's why I need my big sis to help me get the hell out of here.
translation.es: Por eso necesito que mi hermana me ayude a salir de aquí.

translation.en: They are not going to let you just walk. But there might be another way.
translation.es: No te van a soltar y ya. Pero puede haber otra manera.

translation.en: Okay. See, that's what I wanna hear.
translation.es: Eso es lo que quiero oír.

translation.en: That's what I'm here to talk about, the other way.
translation.es: De eso es de lo que quiero hablar.

translation.en: Lay it on me. What do I gotta do?
Re-enlist and finish what you started.
translation.es: Enlistarte y acabar lo que empezaste.

translation.en: I'm not doing that. Look, I'm too old to be a cadet.
translation.es: Nada de eso. Soy grande para ser un cadete.

translation.en: I don't want you to be a cadet. I want you to help train them.
translation.es: No te quiero de cadete. Quiero que los entrenes.

translation.en: Train who? Train what? I'm not training no damn kids.
translation.es: ¿A quiénes? Yo no entrenaré a niños.

translation.en: The transport is standing by to bring both of you to Moyulan.
translation.es: El transporte está listo para llevarlos a Moyulan.
A ti y a tu recluta nueva.

translation.en: I can't believe she just hologrammed me.
translation.es: No puedo creer que mandó un holograma.

translation.en: [Jake] Yeah, look. I didn't have a choice.
[Amara] I know, I get it. But why me?
translation.es: Ya lo sé. Entiendo. Pero ¿por qué yo?

translation.en: Why do they want me for the program?
You built and piloted your own Jaeger.
These people like that kind of stuff.
Okay, so then why am I just a cadet, and you get to be a ranger?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué yo soy cadete y tú eres un ranger?

translation.en: I didn't believe it when they told me you were inbound.
translation.es: No podía creer que ibas a venir.

translation.en: You remember how that works, Ranger Pentecost.
And you must be Amara Namani.
Well, let's get you squared away.
Oh, and, uh, try not to steal anything while you're here.
translation.es: Y trata de no robar nada mientras estés aquí.

translation.en: Did that haircut just call you Pentecost?
Pilot of Coyote Tango, hero of basically the whole world?
translation.es: ¿Piloto de Coyote Tango, héroe de básicamente todo el mundo?

translation.en: You're late, you miss the day.
You fall behind, you'll be on the next transport
back to wherever they found you.
She's the fastest Jaeger in the fleet. Did you know that?
[woman over pa] Warning. Stand clear of lift.
Until his co-pilot got a better offer in the private sector.
translation.es: Hasta que el sector privado se llevó a su copiloto.

translation.en: Heard a lot about you, Pentecost.
You know you still hold the record?
So how'd they lure you back? I mean, it couldn't have been the pay, so...
translation.es: ¿Cómo te hicieron volver? Seguro no fue por la paga...

translation.en: Oh, yeah, it's a long story.
But if you want to talk about it, we can meet up...
translation.es: Pero si quieres, nos podemos ver...

translation.en: -Oh! Come on, Renata, not the face! -Sorry, man.

translation.es: Apuesto dos pases de ducha más.

translation.en: Fold, Ilya. You need all the showers you can get, man.
I have a musk! What you smell is musk.
translation.es: ¡Tengo un almizcle! Lo que hueles es un almizcle.
Cadetes, les presento a Amara Namani.

translation.en: She'll be joining you in sim training bright and early.
translation.es: Entrenará con ustedes en el simulador.
Y este es el ranger Pentecost.

translation.en: He will be helping me instruct you
until I can find a new co-pilot to replace Ranger Burke.
translation.es: hasta que tenga otro copiloto que reemplace al ranger Burke.

translation.en: Malikova, get Namani squared away and prepped for training.
translation.es: Malikova, prepara a Namani para entrenarse.

translation.en: We're gonna be trained by a Pentecost!
Not like he was the one who died helping close the Breach.
translation.es: No fue el que murió cerrando la Brecha.

translation.en: He's never even been in combat.
[Suresh] Renata, let's go for round two.
translation.es: Renata, va otro asalto. Ilya, ¿viste esto?

translation.en: Uh, hey. So where should I...
Heard you built your own little Jaeger.
I operated her, too, with this solo bay...
translation.es: Y lo manejaba de una cabina...

translation.en: You want to put junk together, be a mechanic.
translation.es: Si quieres armar cosas, vuélvete mecánica.

translation.en: Hey, come on. I got ya.
So you and Vik already buddies, huh?
But you don't want to call her that.
Took her three shots to pass the entrance test.
Yeah. Don't think she likes how you landed here.
translation.es: No le gusta cómo llegaste aquí.

translation.en: Recruiters never come around back home.
I'll teach you some. Calms her down.
translation.es: Te voy a enseñar un poco. La calma.

translation.en: Come on. Let's get you squared away.
You know, when I heard you gave November Ajax a run for his money...
translation.es: Cuando supe que le diste pelea a November Ajax...

translation.en: I thought we might have something here.
How am I supposed to drift in this thing?
I didn't ask for your excuses, Cadet.
You putting her up against Kaiju that almost killed veteran pilots,
translation.es: Ponerla contra el kaiju que casi mata a pilotos veteranos

translation.en: Maybe she's not the only one that doesn't belong here.
translation.es: Quizá no sea la única que deba irse.

translation.en: See, Nate, I know you have a problem with me.
translation.es: Ya sé que no te caigo bien.

translation.en: But come on. She's just a kid.
translation.es: Pero ella solo es una niña.

translation.en: So were we. That's the point.
translation.es: Como éramos nosotros. Y a eso voy.

translation.en: You make stronger connections when you're young.
translation.es: De chico haces conexiones más fuertes.

translation.en: And that kind of bond makes for a better drift pilot.
translation.es: Y con esos lazos derivas mejor.

translation.en: Show our new recruit how it's done.
translation.es: Enséñenle a la recluta cómo se hace.

translation.en: What the hell are you wearing?
Yeah, she told me it's nice to finally have someone with style around here.
translation.es: Dice que le da gusto ver a alguien con estilo.

translation.en: Can't blame the girl. I'm sexy.
So one more time around, huh? To prove your old man wrong?
translation.es: ¿Vas a volver a tratar? ¿Para contradecir a tu papá?

translation.en: Nah, I just came back to see if your chin implant ever settled in.
translation.es: No, vine a ver el implante de tu mentón.

translation.en: Well, I think it's settled in quite nicely.
Yeah. It's very commanding. Kids must love it.
translation.es: Sí. Te da presencia. Con los chicos.

translation.en: -Jake, these kids, they look up to us. -Mmm-hmm.
We gotta show them that we can work together.
Well, the war ended 10 years ago, man. You just need to let that go.
translation.es: La guerra acabó hace 10 años. Deja eso atrás.

translation.en: You have to understand your enemy's...
You have to understand your enemy's objective to know you've defeated them.
translation.es: Si no sabes la meta del rival, no sabes si lo venciste.

translation.en: No. I can help you out with that.
translation.es: No. Yo te puedo ayudar con eso.

translation.en: See, I'm thinking it has something to do
with them sending giant monsters to kick the crap out of us.
No, no, no. The Precursors wouldn't send Kaiju
translation.es: No. Los precursores no iban a mandar kaiju

translation.en: to flatten a few cities if they were trying to wipe us all out.
All right, look, Nate, I don't have a problem with you, man.
translation.es: Nate, yo no tengo nada contra ti.

translation.en: But I had to make a choice.
It was between your pretty face and prison.
translation.es: Entre tu cara bonita y la cárcel.

translation.en: How many damn toppings do you need?
Leave my toppings be, man. Don't mess with my damn toppings.
translation.es: Deja mis cosas en paz. No te metas con ellas.

translation.en: So the cadets got like, what, a couple of months before they graduate?
translation.es: ¿A los cadetes les falta un par de meses para graduarse?

translation.en: Every time you want to say something soldiery to them,

translation.es: O diré: "Sí, lo que él dijo".

translation.en: Then before you know it, they get to be pilots.
-I get to get back to my life. -Great.
translation.es: - Y volveré a mi vida. - Excelente.

translation.en: It may happen sooner than you think.
Big dog and pony show tomorrow.
Shao and her team are presenting this new drone program they have.
translation.es: Shao y su equipo presentarán su programa nuevo de drones.
Parece mi pase para salir de la cárcel.

translation.en: You know, you can front all you want,
translation.es: Digo, puedes hacer como que no te importa...

translation.en: but you and I both know you could've been great.
translation.es: pero sabemos que pudiste haber sido grande.

translation.en: It's an honor to meet you.
She doesn't do the whole hand shaking thing.
Dr. Newton Geiszler. Head of research and development for Shao Industries.
translation.es: Doctor Newton Geiszler. Jefe de investigación, Industrias Shao.

translation.en: -That's a nice firm grip you got there. -[all speaking Mandarin]
Ranger Lambert and I will get you set up ma'am.
translation.es: El ranger Lambert y yo la instalaremos.

translation.en: That's a much better look on you.
Guess it's better than prison stripes. Barely.
translation.es: Es preferible al uniforme de preso. Por poco.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm sorry, is this him? It's gotta be him, right?
You're Stacker's kid. Hey, I'm Newt.
translation.es: Eres el hijo de Stacker. Newt.

translation.en: I was a big fan of your father's.
Amazing speech writer, by the way.
Did you ever hear his one where he canceled the apocalypse?
-Hermann... -I was hoping you'd be tagging along.
I could use your help on an experiment I'm working on.
translation.es: Necesito tu ayuda para un experimento.

translation.en: Now, this will only take a moment. I know how busy you are.
translation.es: Es cosa de un minuto. Sé que estás muy ocupado.

translation.en: [Newton] Ah, come on, you can't impose on me.
translation.es: Por favor, no me puedes molestar.

translation.en: I mean, we've been inside each other's heads, right?
translation.es: Hemos estado uno en la cabeza del otro.

translation.en: If we hadn't yanked that intel out of that Kaiju's brain,
translation.es: Si no le sacábamos los secretos de su mente,

translation.en: Raleigh would've never been able to close the Breach.
Now that was you! And that was me!
Technically more me, but any chance we could make this quick, or...
translation.es: Más yo que tú, pero ¿nos podemos apurar?

translation.en: Deploying them into battle, it takes too much time.
translation.es: Desplegarlos en batalla lleva mucho tiempo.

translation.en: The amount of damage a Kaiju can inflict before they've...
translation.es: El daño que puede hacer un kaiju antes de...

translation.en: Ah, here. I think I've found a solution.
translation.es: Aquí está. Creo que encontré una solución.

translation.en: Hermann, you know I can never read your...
translation.es: Hermann, sabes que no puedo leer tu...

translation.en: No. There's no fuel in the world with that kind of boost-to-mass ratio.
translation.es: No hay combustible para esa proporción de empuje y masa.

translation.en: I've discovered Kaiju blood is highly reactive
translation.es: La sangre de kaiju es muy reactiva

translation.en: when it's combined with rare earth elements. Cerium, lanthanum, gadolinium.
translation.es: cuando se combina con elementos raros. Cerio, gadolinio.

translation.en: You can't be fooling around with this stuff. You're gonna blow yourself up.
translation.es: No puedes jugar con eso. Te vas a volar.

translation.en: Now, no one knows more about Kaiju morphology than you!
translation.es: ¡Tú eres la autoridad sobre morfología kaiju!

translation.en: If you could just take a look, please.
No, Hermann, I gotta stop you.
Once my boss's drones are approved,
deployment time, that's gonna be a non-issue.
Within a year, buddy, we're gonna have drones everywhere.
translation.es: En un año habrá drones por todos lados.

translation.en: Look, why don't we talk about it over dinner at my place?
translation.es: Ven a cenar y hablamos de eso.

translation.en: Okay? You can finally meet Alice.
I don't need a hot meal, Newton.
What I need is a solution to a very specific problem.
translation.es: Necesito una solución para un problema.

translation.en: Ah, that's me, bud. I'm sorry.
Duty calls. It's been nice catching up.
translation.es: El deber llama. Qué gusto verte.

translation.en: when we drifted with that disgusting Kaiju brain.
translation.es: cuando derivamos con ese cerebro de kaiju.

translation.en: But it was a hell of a rush, wasn't it?
You and Dr. Gottlieb were close, weren't you?
Your Mandarin makes you sound like an idiot.
translation.es: Con su mandarín, parece un idiota.

translation.en: I know, I'm terrible. Uh, yes, we shared a lab together.
translation.es: Lo sé. Hablo muy mal. Sí. Compartimos un laboratorio.

translation.en: What were you and Dr. Gottlieb talking about?
Some crazy idea he had about thruster pods on a Jaeger.
translation.es: De una locura, quería ponerles propulsores a jaegers.

translation.en: Until Secretary General Mori makes her recommendation at the Council Summit,
translation.es: Hasta que la secretaria Mori haga su recomendación,

translation.en: Could you say that again and this time about 80% slower?
translation.es: ¿Puede repetir eso, pero un 80 % más despacio?

translation.en: [in English] I said, don't make me question your loyalty.
translation.es: Dije: "No me haga cuestionar su lealtad".

translation.en: -I barely talk to the guy anyway. -[speaking in Mandarin]
Then it won't be a problem.
I don't like to repeat myself.
[in English] My drones are the next step in Jaeger evolution.
translation.es: Mis drones son el siguiente paso de los jaegers.

translation.en: processes commands through a quantum data core.
translation.es: procesa órdenes a través de un núcleo cuántico.

translation.en: This means that a single pilot
As soon as the council approves deployment
based on Secretary General Mori's final report,
translation.es: basándose en el reporte de la secretaria general Mori,

translation.en: the days of struggling to find and train drift compatible pilots
translation.es: la búsqueda ardua de pilotos compatibles para derivar

translation.en: will be a thing of the past.
And you think a bunch of desk jockeys are better than us?
We are not here to shut you down.
translation.es: No venimos a cerrar la base.

translation.en: Cooperation between our programs has never been more vital.
translation.es: La cooperación entre los programas es más vital que nunca.

translation.en: If there are any questions. [man] Yeah, I got a question right over here.
translation.es: - Si hay preguntas... - Yo tengo una pregunta.

translation.en: We are pilots. Not a bunch of office workers!
And now we're shouting. There's no need to shout.
So how long until all this is shut down, so I can go home?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto falta para que cierren esto y me vaya?

translation.en: I don't trust the tech. Not yet at least.
translation.es: No confío en la tecnología. Aún no.

translation.en: It looks pretty good to me.
Remote systems can be hacked or compromised.
translation.es: Los sistemas remotos pueden ser hackeados o alterados.

translation.en: No, you've got the key vote, right?
So there you go. It's your decision.
translation.es: Ahí lo tienes. Es tu decisión.

translation.en: I wish I could just go ahead and approve them.
Nearly half the council is backing Liwen.
translation.es: Casi la mitad del consejo apoya a Liwen.

translation.en: They aren't going to like my decision.
translation.es: No les va a gustar mi decisión.

translation.en: Who cares what they like and what they don't like?
translation.es: ¿A quién le importa lo que les guste o no?

translation.en: I tell you what, I'm gonna go with you.
Plus I wanna get out of this place.
because I already requested Gipsy Avenger
translation.es: porque ya pedí a Gipsy Avenger

translation.en: as honor guard at the Council Summit.
His co-pilot works for Liwen now. He needs a new one.
translation.es: Su copiloto se fue a trabajar con Liwen. Necesita otro.

translation.en: One that you already know is drift compatible.
translation.es: Uno compatible para derivar con él.

translation.en: I'll do it. I got your back.
But I wanna be there when you tell Nate
translation.es: Pero quiero verte decirle a Nate

translation.en: because I just wanna see his face. He's gonna be so pissed.
translation.es: para ver su cara. Va a enojarse.

translation.en: He's just gonna stand there like,
translation.es: Se va a quedar ahí parado.

translation.en: [in American accent] "Yeah, I don't think you belong in a Jaeger, Jake.
translation.es: "Sí, tú no sirves para piloto, Jake".

translation.en: He is handsome. He is sexy.
[news anchor 1] Welcome back. Lots of sunshine today to kick off our weekend.
translation.es: Bienvenidos. Hace un día muy soleado. CUERPO DE DEFENSA DEL PACÍFICO CUMBRE DEL CONSEJO

translation.en: Peter Overton broadcasting from the Nine Studios in Sydney...
translation.es: Peter Overton transmitiendo desde Sídney... PROTESTAS VIOLENTAS EN CONTRA DEL PROGRAMA DE DRONES DEL CDP

translation.en: [news anchor 2] So far, police say at least 49 officers injured.
translation.es: Hasta el momento hay 49 policías heridos. PROTESTAS VIOLENTAS EN LA CUMBRE

translation.en: [news anchor 3] Kaiju worshipers in black masks throwing bottles and rocks.
translation.es: Veneradores de los kaiju tirando botellas y rocas. PRO-KAIJUS SE UNEN A LAS PROTESTAS

translation.en: PPDC Security in riot gear are attempting to...
translation.es: Las fuerzas del CDP tratan... JAEGER LÍDER LLEGA A LA CUMBRE DEL CDP

translation.en: [on radio] Gipsy Avenger, this is Marshal Quan.
translation.es: Gipsy Avenger, habla el mariscal Quan.

translation.en: All you have to do is stand there and look pretty.
translation.es: Solo tienen que pararlo ahí y que se vea bonito.

translation.en: Stay focused, try not to fall over.
translation.es: Concéntrense, traten de que no se caiga.

translation.en: Relax. It's coming back to me.
We're in each other's heads, remember?
So I'd appreciate it if you'd stop thinking about Jules.
translation.es: Así que deja de pensar en Jules.

translation.en: How about you stop thinking about kicking my ass?
translation.es: Y tú deja de pensar en partirme la cara.

translation.en: -Gonna be a long day. -[speaking in Mandarin]
Neural handshake is weak, but holding.

translation.es: Transporte llegando. SECRETARIA GENERAL MAKO MORI

translation.en: [woman on radio] Your ETA to zero is two minutes.
translation.es: DRON JAEGER VIABILIDAD Tiempo de llegada, dos minutos.

translation.en: -[electronic voice] Warning. -Gipsy to Command. You reading this?
Be advised. We have a rogue Jaeger.
translation.es: Un aviso. Hay un jaeger rebelde.

translation.en: power down and exit your Conn-Pod immediately.
translation.es: apáguenlo y salgan de su cabina de inmediato.

translation.en: I repeat. Power down, and exit your Conn-Pods now.
translation.es: Repito. Apáguenlo y salgan de sus cabinas de mando ahora mismo.

translation.en: -[electronic voice] Low power warning. -We're losing power!
Jake! That Jaeger's power reading is...
translation.es: ¡Jake! La energía de ese jaeger es...

translation.en: She's going down! We've gotta move!
Mayday! Mayday! Mayday! This is Mike, Mike, Charlie, 0-5-2.
We have been hit, and we are going down!

translation.es: - Alineación de deriva fallando. - ¡Estúpida cosa cerebral!

translation.en: So, I'm not really good at emotional stuff, but...
translation.es: No soy muy buena para las cosas emocionales, pero...

translation.en: I really am sorry about your sister.
translation.es: lamento mucho lo de tu hermana.

translation.en: Yeah, her family died during the Onibaba attack.
translation.es: Sí, su familia murió en el ataque de Onibaba.

translation.en: She was my sister. My family.
translation.es: Era mi hermana. Era de mi familia.

translation.en: Why are you out of uniform?
Just had a lot on my mind after Sydney.
translation.es: He estado pensando mucho en lo de Sídney.

translation.en: I guess I just wanted to be comfortable.
Well, don't let Ranger Lambert see you in that.
translation.es: No dejes que el ranger Lambert te vea así.

translation.en: He might take the stick out of his butt and beat you with it.
translation.es: Te golpeará con su vara alta.

translation.en: I think I'm safe. It's wedged in there pretty tight.
translation.es: No bajará su vara alta para pegarme.

translation.en: Yeah. And I can't drift with her for some reason.
translation.es: Sí. Y no sé por qué, pero no puedo derivar con ella.

translation.en: All the other cadets have been training for years, and I just...
translation.es: Los demás cadetes llevan años entrenándose y yo solo...

translation.en: I hate feeling like the slow kid.
Or you're just grinding gears. I'll help you out.
translation.es: O no vas a avanzar. Yo te ayudaré.
- Sí, entrenador. - No me digas así.

translation.en: We have to make a good connection.
You can't do that if you're yappin' your gums.
translation.es: Y si estás hablando, no vas a poder.

translation.en: Let's see if we're drift compatible.
[Amara's father] Come on, Amara, get him!
Remember, the stronger your connection, the better you fight.
translation.es: Recuerda, entre más fuerte sea la conexión, mejor vas a pelear.

translation.en: [Amara's father] Amara! Come on, jump! Jump to me, baby!
You have to, Amara, come on! Jump!
Amara! Don't hang on to the memory.
Just let it flow right through you. Amara!
translation.es: Déjalo fluir a través de ti.

translation.en: Yeah, come on. Get together. Ready? One, two...
Amara. Amara, you need to let it go. Amara!
Look, just listen to my voice!
-Amara! We need to break the drift! -Jump to me! Come on!
Baby, I will catch you! I promise. Come on!
[Nate] Jake, it's me. Are you there?
Meet me in the lab right away. Marshal wants to see us.
translation.es: Ve al laboratorio. El mariscal llama.

translation.en: [Jake] What is it? [Marshal Quan] A message. From Mako.
[Hermann] She was trying to send it from her copter right before it went down.
translation.es: Lo estaba mandando justo antes de estrellarse.

translation.en: It's a data package. High density.
Obsidian Fury was jamming comms. How could her signal get through?
translation.es: Obsidian Fury bloqueó la señal. ¿Cómo pudo pasar?

translation.en: It didn't. At least not intact.
translation.es: No pasó. Al menos no intacto.

translation.en: [Hermann] "Gone" is relative in the digital realm.
By running a modified fractal algorithm,
I might be able to reconstruct a few megabytes.
I'm checking against PPDC Kaiju archives.
translation.es: Estoy comparando con los archivos. NEGATIVO

translation.en: Keep looking. Whatever this is, it was important to her.
translation.es: Sigue buscando. Esto era importante para ella.

translation.en: And I want to know who was piloting that rogue Jaeger.
translation.es: Y quiero saber quién iba piloteando ese jaeger.

translation.en: Hey. [chuckles] Sorry I'm late. -I thought you were still in Sydney. -[speaking in Mandarin]
translation.es: Perdón por llegar tarde. Creí que seguían en Sídney.

translation.en: The council has approved Drone deployment in an emergency session.
translation.es: El consejo ha aprobado el despliegue de los drones.

translation.en: Thought you'd be a little more enthusiastic, doc.
translation.es: Creía que te ibas a entusiasmar más.

translation.en: Yeah, no, I'm pumped. This is great.
translation.es: Sí, no, es genial. Me encanta.

translation.en: It's just the timing of everything with the attack and all, feels a little...
translation.es: Es que la coordinación de todo con el ataque es...

translation.en: I was there. I know what happened.
translation.es: Yo estuve ahí. Sé lo que pasó.

translation.en: If our Drones had been in the field.
-Yeah. Uh, I guess they do. -[speaking in Mandarin]
Which means the attack was positive...
If you look at it sideways, and you squint,
translation.es: Si lo ve de lado con medio ojo,

translation.en: then maybe you could say that. Uh...
-I'm sorry, what is going on here? -[speaking Mandarin]
The council expects full deployment in 48 hours.
translation.es: Esperamos un despliegue total en 48 horas.

translation.en: I've worked my whole life for this.
Okay. Yeah. Not a problem. -That'll be fine. -[speaking Mandarin]
translation.es: Bueno. Sí. No hay problema. Todo saldrá bien.

translation.en: You don't think there's a way? All right, well, then you're fired.
translation.es: ¿No ves la manera? Bueno, estás despedida.

translation.en: Or maybe you're promoted. I don't know. We'll see how it goes.
translation.es: O quizá te ascienda. No sé. A ver qué pasa.

translation.en: Sorry I'm late. God, things were...
translation.es: Perdón por llegar tarde. Las cosas se pusieron...

translation.en: Things were crazy today with what happened in Sydney.
translation.es: Hoy fue una locura con lo que pasó en Sídney.

translation.en: All those people, it was not pretty.
translation.es: Tanta gente, no fue nada bonito.

translation.en: My boss almost got killed. That could've been bad.
translation.es: Casi matan a mi jefa. Eso hubiera sido malo.

translation.en: Maybe. I guess, I don't know.
That would've been great actually, that one is all over me.
translation.es: Hubiera sido maravilloso, la verdad. Me tiene frito.

translation.en: I mean, I can't get a break from her!
And enough about her, really, I should be focused on you.
translation.es: Y basta con ella. Debería concentrarme en ti.

translation.en: How about we have a little fun in the bedroom?
Oh, that's great. Yeah, that's exciting.
Well, [clears throat] what can I say?
There's never been a rogue like this.
translation.es: No ha habido un rebelde así.

translation.en: News feed said they were posting a dozen Jaegers at the memorial.
translation.es: Habrá una docena de jaegers en el homenaje.

translation.en: When I die, I want that many to send me off.
Your pop's gonna make you work with boobs when you wash out.
translation.es: Tu papá te pondrá a operar pechos cuando te echen.

translation.en: Jaegers do not show up when the boob guy dies.
translation.es: Nada de jaegers en tu entierro.

translation.en: Wait, your dad works with boobs?
He's a plastic surgeon. He doesn't just work with...
translation.es: Es cirujano plástico. No solo pechos...

translation.en: I'm not gonna wash out. I'm gonna be a pilot.
translation.es: No me van a echar. Voy a ser piloto.

translation.en: Still. You die, meh, I post one Jaeger at your funeral.
translation.es: Aun así. Si mueres, mandaría un jaeger al funeral.

translation.en: I heard that's where they found Amara. In half a Jaeger.
translation.es: Oí que encontraron a Amara en medio jaeger.
Solo que no era muy grande...

translation.en: I worked every day of my life to be here. You didn't do anything.
translation.es: Yo he trabajado duro para estar aquí. Tú no.

translation.en: You were just picked up off the street, like garbage!
You know where I learned that?
On the streets, you big, dumb...
You know, when I first joined the Corps, I was just like you.
translation.es: Cuando entré al cuerpo, era igual que ustedes.

translation.en: But that woman we laid to rest today, Mako Mori,
translation.es: Pero la mujer que enterramos, Mako Mori...

translation.en: the minute you enter this program, you join a family.
translation.es: al entrar aquí entras a una familia.

translation.en: And no matter what they do,
no matter how stupid they may act sometimes,
you forgive 'em, and you move on."
So you start believing that. In here.
translation.es: Así que empiecen a creer eso. Aquí.

translation.en: And you'll start believing it in a Jaeger.
translation.es: Y empezarán a creer en un jaeger.

translation.en: Marshal's looking for you guys. Says Gottlieb found something.
translation.es: Los busca el mariscal. Dice que Gottlieb descubrió algo.
No es una cosa. Es un lugar.

translation.en: Severnaya Zemlya. Off Siberia's Taymyr Peninsula.
translation.es: Severnaya Zemlya. Cerca de la península de Taimyr en Siberia.
- ¿Qué hay en Zemlya? - Pues ya no hay nada.

translation.en: A facility roughly in this location
was used to manufacture Jaeger power cores earlier in the war,
translation.es: donde fabricaban núcleos de energía para jaegers,

translation.en: but it was decommissioned years ago.
Why would Mako be trying to tell us about an abandoned factory
translation.es: ¿Qué nos habrá querido decir de una fábrica

translation.en: Sir, permission to take Gipsy Avenger to see what the hell's out there.
translation.es: Señor, permiso para llevar a Gipsy Avenger a ver qué demonios hay ahí.

translation.en: [sighs] Looks like Mako's message was a dead end.
translation.es: Parece que el mensaje de Mako fue inútil.

translation.en: -[alarm blaring] -We gotta get out of here!
I think we pissed him off.
get the hell out of your Conn-Pod.
A secondary brain used to control the hindquarters.
translation.es: Es otro cerebro para las piernas.

translation.en: How'd they get into our world?
There hasn't been a breach in 10 years.
I don't think there was a breach.
Kaiju flesh has a distinct radioactive half-life signature.
translation.es: La carne kaiju tiene una firma radioactiva precisa.

translation.en: Okay, so, you're saying that it's from our universe?
The genetic fingerprints indicate distinctly terrestrial modification techniques,
translation.es: Las huellas genéticas indican técnicas de modificación terrestres

translation.en: probably engineered from Kaiju flesh left over from the war.
translation.es: probablemente diseñadas con carne kaiju tras la guerra.

translation.en: Oh, my God. That hunk of slimy crap was piloting Obsidian Fury?
translation.es: Dios mío. ¿Esa masa babosa estaba piloteando a Obsidian Fury?

translation.en: -[Amara] We gotta get a look inside. -Inside?
When are we ever gonna get a chance to see something like this again?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo podremos ver algo así otra vez?

translation.en: You guys can stay here. I'm going.
translation.es: Ustedes quédense aquí. Yo voy a ir.

translation.en: [Suresh] Guys, guys, we should not be in here.
It's fused all the way through the system.
translation.es: Está fusionado a través del sistema.

translation.en: [Jinhai] That's how it was able to move like it did. Cool.
translation.es: Por eso podía moverse como se movía. Genial.

translation.en: Working with boobs is sounding better and better.
translation.es: Trabajar con pechos no suena tan mal.

translation.en: Yeah, let's just go yank on the guts of the weird-ass Kaiju killbot.
translation.es: Sí, vamos a destripar a este robot asesino kaiju.

translation.en: -I told you not to yank on those. -Go get help! Go!
translation.es: - Te dije que no los jalaras. - ¡Ve por ayuda!

translation.en: This goes way past what she did. [Marshal Quan] The decision has been made.
translation.es: - Esto excede lo que ella hizo. - Ya decidimos.

translation.en: Security will take it from here. We're done.
He's got some scarring, but, yeah, he'll live.
Meilin and Suresh, too. They blink wrong, all of 'em are out.
translation.es: Y a Meilin y a Suresh. A la primera, adiós.

translation.en: No, it's not their fault. I talked them into it.
translation.es: No fue culpa de ellos. Yo los convencí.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I tried to talk to the Marshal,
but you're dismissed from the program.
You know, I used to say the same thing a long time ago.
translation.es: Yo decía lo mismo hace mucho tiempo.

translation.en: But I actually didn't wanna be here.
translation.es: Pero yo no quería estar aquí.

translation.en: We were at war. And my dad was leading the charge, and I thought
translation.es: Estábamos en guerra. Y mi papá dirigía la carga, así que pensé

translation.en: maybe I could see more of him.
Well, one night, me and Nate got into it.
translation.es: Pero una noche me peleé con Nate.

translation.en: It was over something stupid. I can't even remember what.
translation.es: Por una estupidez. Ni me acuerdo por qué.

translation.en: So, I climbed in an old Mark IV,
translation.es: Me trepé en un viejo Mark-4

translation.en: just to show him I didn't need him to be a great pilot.
translation.es: para enseñarle que podía pilotearlo yo solo.

translation.en: About seven steps. Take or leave.
translation.es: Como siete pasos. Más o menos.

translation.en: About two steps, and I blacked out from the strain.
translation.es: Dos pasos y me desmayé de la tensión.

translation.en: And the first thing I saw when I woke up was my dad,
translation.es: Y cuando desperté, vi a mi papá parado

translation.en: just standing right in front of me, looking stern.
translation.es: enfrente de mí, con una cara seria.

translation.en: He said I was out of the program.
He said I didn't deserve to be in a Jaeger. Look, he said a lot of things.
translation.es: Dijo que no merecía estar en un jaeger y otras cosas más.

translation.en: A year later, my dad was gone.
translation.es: Un año después, mi papá había muerto.

translation.en: And I didn't get a chance to prove him wrong.
More importantly, I didn’t get a chance to prove it to myself.
translation.es: Y no pude demostrarme a mí que había sido un error.

translation.en: Don't let what other people think of you define who you are.
translation.es: No dejes que lo que piensan otros te defina.

translation.en: You won't like where that takes you. Do you understand?
translation.es: No te va a gustar el resultado. ¿Entiendes?

translation.en: And you might just be as good-looking as me in this type of situation.
translation.es: Y quizá, en esa situación, seas así de guapa.

translation.en: This face is set up well. Beauty is a burden.
translation.es: Esta cara está bien trazada. La belleza es un peso.

translation.en: Obsidian Fury has tech in it made by Shao Industries.
translation.es: Obsidian Fury tiene tecnología de Industrias Shao.

translation.en: Jules and her team scanned every centimeter of that Jaeger.
translation.es: Jules escaneó a fondo ese jaeger.

translation.en: Insulating meta materials wound counter-clockwise in the shunt cabling.
translation.es: Materiales aislantes enredados hacia la izquierda en el cableado.

translation.en: Shao's the only company that winds them that way.
translation.es: Solo los de Shao los enredan así.

translation.en: Amara, are you sure about what you're telling me right now? Yes.
translation.es: - ¿Estás segura de lo que estás diciendo? - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah. I stole a ton to make Scrapper.
translation.es: Sí. Robé un montón para hacer a Scrapper.

translation.en: I thought it might be important.
Shao Industries? They don't even have a bio-division.
translation.es: ¿Industrias Shao? Ni siquiera tienen una división biológica.

translation.en: Yeah, not that we know of.
Cabling could have been stolen, just like in Amara's Jaeger.
translation.es: Quizá robaron el cableado, como Amara.

translation.en: We're gonna need more than that to connect Fury to Shao.
translation.es: Necesitamos más para involucrar a Shao.

translation.en: He'd have access to the internal records, the shipping manifests.
translation.es: Él tiene acceso a los libros, los manifiestos.

translation.en: All right, go see him. Keep a low profile.
We'll take what we know to the Marshal.
translation.es: Le llevaremos lo que sabemos al mariscal.

translation.en: No visitors without the proper credentials.
I don't want anyone interfering with deployment.
[Jinhai] I'm sorry. You don't deserve this.
translation.es: Lo lamento. No te mereces esto.

translation.en: -And we have delivery at 100%, people. -System online.
translation.es: - Tenemos entrega al 100 %. - Sistema en línea.

translation.en: A hundred percent! That's the way that it's done, okay?
I told you we could do it, and we did it!
translation.es: ¡Les dije que podíamos y así fue!

translation.en: [Marshal Quan] We'll take what we know to the council in person.
The Drones in the field are malfunctioning!
Stop the ones coming in from deploying!
[over pa] All pilots, man your Jaegers and engage hostiles!
translation.es: Pilotos, ¡tripulen sus jaegers y ataquen al enemigo!

translation.en: Okay, you got this. You cool? Yeah, super cool. Just stay calm...
translation.es: Tú puedes. ¿Estás bien? Sí, superbién. Conserva la calma...

translation.en: Dr. Geiszler! Shao's looking for you.
I know! I'm heading up. I'm heading right...
Hermann. What are you doing here? How'd you get in here?
And besides, everyone else seems a little bit preoccupied
with the killer drones your boss just set off!
translation.es: ¡Por los drones asesinos de tu jefa!

translation.en: She lured you with money and a fancy title. No. No way.
translation.es: - Te atrajo con dinero y un puesto. - No.

translation.en: While you were basking in the glow,
she took your research and she twisted it.
Help me stop her, Newton. Help me save the world like old times.
translation.es: Ayúdame a pararla. Ayúdame a salvar al mundo, como antes.

translation.en: All right, technically, you were helping me last time.
translation.es: Técnicamente, tú me ayudaste a mí.

translation.en: Fine. Help me help you save the world.
translation.es: Bueno. Ayúdame a ayudarte a salvar al mundo.

translation.en: God damn it, why can't I get this language?
No, they're drones from Shao Industries.
-What are they doing? -I don't know! They just went crazy!
Get back to your quarters right now!
Go! Get the hell out of here! Come on! Go, go!
Come on. Come on, come on. Get up.
Next time, why don't you learn how to use a gun? Take that!
translation.es: La próxima vez, aprende a usar una pistola. ¡Toma!

translation.en: I'd hug you if I didn't have a rule about public displays of affection.
translation.es: Te abrazaría si no fuera indecoroso.

translation.en: Okay! All right. If you're done groping me?
Let's take care of the drones, right? All right, good.
translation.es: Vamos a desactivar a los drones.

translation.en: Everyone, get out of the lab or I will shoot you!
translation.es: ¡Váyanse todos de aquí o les doy un tiro!

translation.en: -I will shoot you twice! -[speaking in Mandarin]
What do we do? How do we stop this?

translation.es: - ¿A dónde? - A la subrutina de los drones.

translation.en: just in case I wanna get in here and poke around down the road.
translation.es: por si quería meterme y hacer cambios.

translation.en: What I've been planning the last 10 years.
Where the hell are my pilots?!
Breaches detected, multiple locations! It's the Drones, sir!
Drones in the field are opening multiple breaches across the Pacific Rim!
translation.es: ¡Los drones están abriendo brechas a orillas del Pacífico!

translation.en: Why would I do this? Hmm. Well...
I guess I wouldn't. Not normally, not really my style.
translation.es: Normalmente no lo haría. No es mi estilo.

translation.en: Yeah, no, I don't know, maybe I hate you all
translation.es: Sí, no, no sé, quizá los odio

translation.en: for treating me like an insignificant, little joke of a man.
translation.es: por tratarme como a un hombrecillo.

translation.en: Maybe that's why he did it, Hermann. I did it.
translation.es: Quizá por eso lo hizo, Hermann. Yo lo hice.

translation.en: I'm just not feeling totally myself these days.
translation.es: No me he sentido normal últimamente.

translation.en: Very good, Hermann, you figured it out.
And as usual, a step behind.
-You must stop. -No, there's no point in fighting them.
-You must fight back. -I'm not strong enough, Hermann.
-Please. You must! -I am not strong enough.
None of you are strong enough!
You're not going to ruin my life's work.
translation.es: No arruinará la obra de mi vida.

translation.en: The hell are you doing here? I told you to get to quarters!
All the doors are blocked! What do we do?
How did you do it without me knowing?
I mean, 38% of your company is fully automated.
translation.es: El 38 % de su compañía está automatizada.

translation.en: It really wasn't very hard to reallocate a little over here
translation.es: No fue difícil asignar un poco aquí

translation.en: And slip in a little Kaiju surprise without you noticing.
translation.es: Y meter una sorpresa kaiju desapercibida.
Sobre todo porque usted siempre se creía

translation.en: you were the smartest person in the room.
In about a second, I'm going to be.
[Hermann] Stop! Wait, wait, wait. Newt's not in control of himself!
It isn't him! It's the Precursors.
They must've infected his mind when we drifted with the Kaiju.
translation.es: Le infectaron la mente cuando derivó.

translation.en: Security, find and detain Dr. Geiszler.
If he tries to resist, put a bullet in his head.
Stay here! We're gonna try and get to Gipsy.
translation.es: ¡Quédense aquí! Trataremos de llegar a Gipsy.

translation.en: We're under attack. You need to force Liwen
-to shut down the drones! -It isn't her.
It isn't Liwen. It was Newt.
Gottlieb, can you get him to disable the drones?
-Gottlieb, shut them down. -[Liwen speaking in Mandarin]
It's trying to lock you out.
[Jake] Gottlieb, what the hell is going on? Gottlieb!
Gottlieb, shut them down or we're gonna die!
The breaches are closed. I repeat, the breaches are closed.
translation.es: Se cerraron las brechas. Repito, se cerraron las brechas.

translation.en: South Korea, Russian coast, and East China Sea.
translation.es: En Corea del Sur, en la costa rusa y en el mar de China.
Dos categorías cuatro y uno categoría cinco.

translation.en: We're gonna need all the help we can get.
All right, what do we got?
The reports are still coming in,
but drones took out Jaegers and Shatterdomes across the Rim.
translation.es: los drones eliminaron jaegers y bases.

translation.en: All right. How many Jaegers do we have here?
Okay. We need more Jaegers up and running or this is gonna be a short fight.
translation.es: Necesitamos más jaegers o será una pelea breve.

translation.en: Even if we can, all of our other pilots are either dead or severely injured.
translation.es: Aún teniéndolos, no hay más pilotos.

translation.en: One disaster at a time. Let's just focus on those Jaegers.
translation.es: Un desastre a la vez. Primero, los jaegers.

translation.en: I need you to help Jules with the repairs. Can you do that?
translation.es: ¿Le ayudas a Jules a reparar jaegers?

translation.en: I thought I was kicked out.
She's pretty good at turning junk into Jaegers.
[Jake] All right. We got a lot of work to do
and not a lot of time.
I took the liberty of assigning the designations.
translation.es: Me tomé la libertad de nombrarlos.

translation.en: Well, the spiky guy and the big idiot
are moving away from the cities and towards the ocean.
translation.es: se alejan de ciudades y van al mar.

translation.en: Maybe they're trying to link up with Hakuja in the East China Sea.
translation.es: Quizá se quieren unir a Hakuja en el mar de China oriental.

translation.en: Yeah, I bet Newt would know what they're up to,
translation.es: Y seguro Newt sabría qué se traen

translation.en: if we can get it out of him.
Yeah, we'd have to find him first.
Any Jaegers closer to those Kaiju than us?
What was left of the Chin-do and Sakhalinsk domes tried to intercept.
translation.es: Jaegers de Sakhalinsk trataron de interceptar.

translation.en: I'm afraid we're on our own. [Nate] There's gotta be something here.
translation.es: - Vamos solos. - Debe haber algo aquí.

translation.en: Something in the East China Sea.
translation.es: Algo en el mar de China oriental.

translation.en: Maybe that's not where they're headed.
Pull up a map of Kaiju movement from the war.
translation.es: Saca un mapa de los kaiju en la guerra.

translation.en: What, do you know something we don't?
You said we need to understand our enemy's objective
translation.es: Tú dijiste que debemos saber la meta del rival
para saber si lo hemos vencido.

translation.en: What if the Kaiju weren't blindly attacking our cities during the war?
translation.es: ¿Y si los kaiju no vinieron a atacar ciudades?

translation.en: What if we were just in their way?
Extrapolate for Hakuja, Shrikethorn and Raijin.
translation.es: Extrapolar para Hakuja, Shrikethorn y Raijin.

translation.en: Mount Fuji is a volcano rich in rare earth elements.
translation.es: El volcán es rico en elementos terrestres raros.

translation.en: Kaiju blood reacts extremely violently with rare earth elements
translation.es: La sangre kaiju reacciona violentamente con ellos,

translation.en: is the basis of my fuel-thruster experiments. Excuse me.
translation.es: y en eso se basan mis propulsores. Disculpa.

translation.en: -Whoa. That sounds bad. That's bad, right? -Very.
Mount Fuji's active. A geological pressure point.
translation.es: El monte Fuji es un punto de presión geológica.

translation.en: Based on the blood to mass ratio of the Kaiju,
translation.es: Dada la cantidad de sangre kaiju,

translation.en: the reaction would cause a cascade event,
translation.es: la reacción causaría una reacción en cadena

translation.en: igniting the Ring of Fire around the Pacific Rim.
translation.es: encendiendo el cinturón de fuego del Pacífico.

translation.en: Billions of tons of toxic gas and ash will spew into the atmosphere,
translation.es: Miles de millones de toneladas de gas y cenizas entrarían en la atmósfera

translation.en: We can't let them reach Mount Fuji.
translation.es: No pueden llegar al monte Fuji.

translation.en: I'm gonna check with Jules for Jaeger repairs.
translation.es: Iré a ver cómo van con las reparaciones.

translation.en: Even if we had a hundred Jaegers, there's no way to intercept in time.
translation.es: Aun teniendo 100 jaegers, no podrían llegar a tiempo.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. They're not ready.
Well, in theory, maybe, with your help.
translation.es: En teoría, quizá, con su ayuda.

translation.en: Gottlieb, what does that mean, "in theory"?
[electronic voice] Power partially restored in sectors two...
Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo and Bracer Phoenix are good to go.
translation.es: Saber Athena, Guardián Bravo y Bracer Phoenix listos.

translation.en: It's not a lot to work with.
Liwen can patch some Fury tech into Gipsy that might help.
translation.es: Liwen le instaló avances de Fury a Gipsy.
- Prepara todo lo que tenemos. - Bueno.

translation.en: We got four Jaegers against two Category-Fours and a Fiver.
translation.es: Tenemos cuatro jaegers contra dos categorías 4 y un 5.

translation.en: If my dad was here, he'd probably give you a big speech.
translation.es: Si mi papá viviera, les daría un discurso.

translation.en: I'm not a hero like he was.
translation.es: No soy un héroe, como él.

translation.en: But they didn't start out that way.
translation.es: Pero nadie empieza siendo un héroe.

translation.en: They started out as cadets, just like you.
translation.es: Ellos empezaron como cadetes, como ustedes.

translation.en: We remember them as giants because they stood tall.
translation.es: Los recordamos como gigantes porque se irguieron.

translation.en: It doesn't matter who your parents are,
where you came from, who believed in you and who didn't.
translation.es: de dónde vienen, quién creyó en ustedes y quién no.

translation.en: And we are Earth's last defense.
translation.es: Y la última defensa de la Tierra.

translation.en: This is our time, this is our chance to make a difference.
translation.es: Este es nuestro momento, la hora de hacer la diferencia.

translation.en: Now let's mount up and get it done!
Now help me save the world.
So, how does it feel to be in a real Jaeger?
translation.es: ¿Qué se siente estar en un jaeger?

translation.en: All right, all Jaegers sound off.
Command, we are go for launch.
My grandmother used to play it for me.
What about me? Not calm, man, not calm.
translation.es: ¿Y yo qué? No estoy nada calmado.

translation.en: Everyone in the city is secured in underground shelters.
translation.es: Todos en la ciudad están en refugios.

translation.en: Bracer Phoenix, on me. We'll take Raijin.

translation.es: - ataquen a los otros dos. - Entendido.

translation.en: It's our turn to save the world.
are absorbing the hits and throwing the energy back at you!
How many buildings can this thing take?
Hey, guys, we could use a little help over here! Right now!
translation.es: ¡Oigan, necesitamos un poco de ayuda! ¡Ahora mismo!

translation.en: Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo coming to assist!
[Suresh] Yeah, that's right! You better run!
Okay, we're going with giant robots again.
translation.es: Otra vez sacamos los robots gigantes.

translation.en: We've got movement! Multiple hostiles, three kilometers southeast.
translation.es: ¡Movimiento! Enemigos múltiples, tres kilómetros al sudeste.

translation.en: That's one of my automated factories.
translation.es: Es una de mis fábricas automatizadas.

translation.en: It was Newt. He's in Tokyo.
Hostiles, one klick away and closing fast!
Let's go, all right, go, go, go! Go, baby, go, baby!
advance and fire everything you've got on my command!
translation.es: ¡avancen y disparen con todo cuando lo ordene!

translation.en: Do you copy? Come on, guys, sound off!
[Nate] Guardian Bravo, give me a sitrep. You guys okay?
You just stay put, and we'll send you help as soon as we can.
translation.es: Quédate ahí y enviaremos ayuda pronto.

translation.en: We're a little banged up, but we're still in the fight.
translation.es: Un poco golpeados, pero seguimos en la pelea.

translation.en: Saber, Bracer, prepare to intercept at the following coordinates.
translation.es: Saber, Bracer, intercepten en este punto.

translation.en: Move your ass. And don't be late.
do you have a tactical scan of the hostile?
We have it, Gipsy, but it's still compiling.
[Jake] No time. Can you locate the brains?
Hostile's central brain mass is heavily armored.
Your weapons won't be able to penetrate.
What about a secondary brain? This son of a bitch have one of those?
translation.es: ¿Y tiene otro cerebro? ¿El hijo de perra tiene otro?

translation.en: All right, team, follow my lead and stay alert!
Fire up some of that Fury tech Liwen grabbed us.
translation.es: Activa la tecnología de Fury que nos pusieron.

translation.en: [electronic voice] Warning. Neural load exceeding limit.
[Jake] Nate, stay with me! Stay with me!
Get up from that, you pile of junk!
Liwen! Is there anything you can do to help?
-If the hostile reaches Mount Fuji... -[Jake] Understood.
translation.es: - Si llega al monte Fuji... - Entendido.

translation.en: Jake, you can't operate Gipsy without a co-pilot!
translation.es: ¡No puedes operar a Gipsy sin copiloto!

translation.en: The strain will tear your mind apart!
Getting the hell out of your way.

translation.es: Solo hay una forma de saberlo.

translation.en: Stand by, Command. Initiating neural handshake.
Yeah, that was supposed to be epic,
translation.es: Pensé que iba a ser épico,
- pero no lo fue. - No lo fue.

translation.en: [electronic voice] Warning. Cascade failure. Multiple systems offline.
translation.es: Cuidado. Falla en serie. Múltiples sistemas desconectados.

translation.en: Hostile is two kilometers from the summit of Mount Fuji and closing fast!
translation.es: ¡Enemigo a dos kilómetros de la cima del Fuji y acercándose rápido!

translation.en: Gottlieb, do you have enough fuel left in your thrusters
to launch us into the atmosphere?
Possibly, but there won't be enough to slow your reentry.
translation.es: Es posible, pero no podrán desacelerar luego.

translation.en: [Jake] We don't need to slow down.
We're gonna drop Gipsy right on top of that thing.
translation.es: Vamos a echarle encima a Gipsy.

translation.en: I just ejected my escape pod.
Yeah. We'll have to use mine.
translation.es: Sí. Tendremos que usar la mía.

translation.en: Jake, there's only one thruster with enough fuel remaining.
translation.es: Solo queda un propulsor con combustible.

translation.en: Remote systems are online. Sending help!
[Jake] Come on, come on! Move them little legs!
The thruster's way too strong, there's no way we can hold on to it!
translation.es: ¡El propulsor es muy potente, se nos escapará!

translation.en: I can weld it to your hand.
Nice. I was actually gonna do that.
translation.es: Qué bien. Yo lo iba a hacer.

translation.en: We only got one shot at this.
Yeah! Then let's make it count.
Stay there! You're an extra ton we can drop on that thing!
translation.es: ¡Quédate ahí! ¡Eres una tonelada más de impacto!

translation.en: Jake, Amara, you need to eject!
I will catch you! I promise!
Gipsy to Command, we're getting the hell out of here!
translation.es: ¡Gipsy a Mando, nos vamos de aquí!

translation.en: We got to save the world.
Twenty kilometers to impact. Get out of there!
translation.es: Veinte kilómetros para el impacto. ¡Salgan de ahí!

translation.en: Plan B. Always a Plan B.
translation.es: Plan B. Siempre hay un plan B.

translation.en: Be advised, we just caught ourselves a Newt.
I'm glad you're still okay, man.
[Nate panting] You, too, brother. I knew you could do it.
Well, I had a lot of help.
So out of all the things to notice right now, you're noticing snow?
translation.es: Hay tanto que notar, ¿y notas la nieve?

translation.en: Big, dead Kaiju is right there.
translation.es: Hay un kaiju enorme muerto ahí.

translation.en: -Okay, okay, all right. -And I'm not sure if you're...
Is this the part where you're gonna give me one of those big, dumb speeches?
Did everyone think it was dumb, or is that just your opinion...
translation.es: ¿A todos les pareció estúpido o a ti?

translation.en: Just be honest. How many times did you practice that in front of the mirror?
It was motivational. You can be whoever you wanna be.
-I'm a natural at this. -No, you're not a natural because...
translation.es: - Soy buena. - No eres buena porque...

translation.en: Oh! Give me a break. I've never done this before!
You think this is over, huh?
You think you've saved your crappy little world?
We are never going to stop
[distorted] your luck is going to run out!
they won't need to worry about coming for us.
translation.es: no se preocupen por venir acá.

translation.en: Because we're gonna come for them.
translation.es: Porque vamos a ir por ellos.
